services.title: Language Services
services.intro: Placement follows the CEFR (Common European Framework) to ensure transparent, internationally recognized leveling. We offer professional training, language institute services, and bespoke workshops.

methodology.intro: Language learning is a key tool to navigate the 21st century. We create in-house audiovisual materials and use social media boosters to accompany students at every moment.

meta.title: Further Corporate: Leading Language Consultancy
meta.description: We are Further Corporate: Over 25 years and 50,000 trained students back our experience. Discover our mission, vision, and unique proposals for language learning.

hero.badge: 25+ Years of Experience in Language Teaching
hero.subtitle: More than two decades shaping confident speakers.
hero.description: At Further Corporate, we offer comprehensive and customized language solutions: from B2B training (In-Company) to professional development and proprietary audiovisual resources. We support companies and professionals in their global growth.
hero.imageAlt: Further Corporate team during a language training session
hero.caption: Leading language consultancy with an international presence since 1997.

intro.heading: Why Choose Further?
paragraphs: Further was founded in 1997 with a clear vision: to transform language teaching. Today, with over 25 years of experience, we design customized language programs to empower companies and professionals.
Our commitment is to real progress: we measure results, foster effective communication, and build confidence for professional interactions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To teach with a communicative and practical approach so our students feel confident interacting with other cultures.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To create added value that positively impacts our students’ professional performance in the short term, helping companies become more globally competitive.

staff.title: Our Teaching Team
staff.text: We have an excellent teaching staff, including native speakers, to enhance practical learning.

media.title: Discover Further Media
media.text: Explore our podcast, YouTube channel, and TikTok content. Practice vocabulary, improve your comprehension, and join the #FurtherExperience.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Learn about the experience of companies and professionals who trust us.

items.quote: Further helped us strengthen our global communication as a team. The improvement was tangible in just a few months.
items.name: Agustin

items.quote: Further’s communicative and practical approach allowed us to apply the language directly to our daily work environment.
items.name: Marité
items.role: MH Consultant | Co-founder Crocus Duty Free

items.quote: The teaching team is exceptional: native instructors, constant feedback, and measurable results.
items.name: Gustavo

items.quote: Professionalism, warmth, and real results. A learning experience that truly makes a difference.
items.name: Silvina

cta.title: Join the #FurtherExperience
cta.subtitle: We support you from start to finish in your language development.

meta.title: Further Corporate: Business Language Training (B2B)
meta.description: Tailor-made B2B solutions: In-Company programs (online or in-person), Professional Development Workshops, and Competency Assessments. Over 50 companies already trust Further.

hero.description: Customized corporate programs aligned with the CEFR (Common European Framework) for measurable and lasting results.

cards.title: In-Company Language Training
cards.description: Synchronous online or in-person classes with real-time instructors, exclusive materials, and continuous learning resources that enhance the #FurtherExperience.

cards.title: On-Site Corporate Training
cards.description: In-company language programs designed to strengthen teamwork, encourage office learning, and reinforce company culture. Available across Argentina: CABA, Salta, Mar del Plata, Rosario, Córdoba, and Mendoza.

cards.title: Competency Assessment & Custom Programs
cards.description: Quick evaluation of your team’s language proficiency. Our CEFR-based assessments ensure accurate placement and measurable progress. We also design custom workshops and special programs to maximize performance.

highlight.title: Innovation at the Service of Learning
highlight.text: At Further, we integrate cutting-edge technology to enhance your learning experience: chatbots, customer service, automated reporting, and assisted practice tools. We innovate to deliver tailored and effective solutions.
highlight.cta: Interested in learning more about our innovative approach? Contact us

cefr.title: International CEFR Placement
cefr.p1: Our placement process is based on the CEFR (Common European Framework for Languages) to guarantee transparency and global reliability.
cefr.p2: The CEFR defines levels from A1 (beginner) to C2 (mastery), providing a consistent international standard for language proficiency.

meta.title: Further Academy: Expert-Certified Self-Study Language Courses
meta.description: Professional English training for the corporate world. Fast and flexible courses in key business topics: Pitch, Job Search, AI. Learn at your own pace with Further Academy.

hero.description: Further Academy is our online self-study platform, designed to meet the demand for fast, effective training with short-term impact. We bring over 25 years of communication expertise to help professionals and companies access flexible, modern, and relevant content for today’s corporate world.
hero.sub: Learn at your own pace, strengthen your skills, and earn your Further certification.

intro.title: Study whenever and wherever you want,
intro.highlight: with no fixed schedules or limits
intro.copy: Further Academy is the ideal solution for professionals and companies seeking total flexibility. Study at your own pace, enhance your skills, and achieve professional growth. Upon completion, you’ll receive a Further certification and evaluation from an expert instructor.
intro.imageAlt: Student learning English online from their computer

featured.title: Pitch Mastery
featured.desc: Learn how to present your ideas with clarity and impact. Develop your professional English pitch with guided exercises, personalized feedback, and practical videos.

courses.title: Available Courses
courses.subtitle: Expert-designed training for today’s corporate professionals.

items.quote: Further’s courses are dynamic, practical, and high quality — perfect for professionals who want to keep learning without giving up their schedules.
items.name: PAULA

items.quote: Excellent teaching support and a clear methodology. I was able to progress at my own pace and certify my achievements without rigid schedules.
items.name: AGUSTÍN

latest.title: Our Courses
latest.subtitle: Discover our business-focused English programs designed for real-world impact.

pitch.title: Pitch Mastery
pitch.desc: Transform how you present your ideas in English through 10 practical lessons focused on clarity, confidence, and delivery.

job.title: Job Search Chess
job.desc: Master the art of standing out in English interviews — from profile optimization to communication strategy and confidence.

calls.title: Ace Online Calls
calls.desc: Learn to communicate confidently in online meetings and presentations across digital platforms.

meta.title: Further School: English Institute in Parque Patricios and Saavedra
meta.description: English classes from age 3 and up! Over 25 years of excellence in Parque Patricios and Saavedra. Immersive methodology, communicative focus, and Cambridge exam preparation.

fun.title: Learning through play
fun.body: Our classes are anything but boring. With games, activities, events, and custom multimedia materials, your English learning experience will be dynamic and engaging every step of the way.

park.title: Our Campuses
park.body: Parque Patricios: since 1997, our institute has been located in the heart of Parque Patricios. Saavedra: now experience #FurtherLearning in the north of Buenos Aires.

culture.title: Culture and Real Communication
culture.body: We understand language as a cultural component. We promote an English-speaking environment to make learning natural, focusing on real communication and fluency.

exams.title: International Exam Preparation
exams.toefl: TOEFL — Test of English as a Foreign Language

instagram.title: Further School
instagram.ctaBody: Join the #FurtherCommunity. We integrate play, creativity, and interaction as key pillars for natural learning. Our community grows every day with new classroom experiences.

testimonials.title: Join the #FurtherCommunity
testimonials.subtitle: What our students say — Real results and steady progress.

meta.title: Furthermore — Learn English through play
meta.description: Card games for English learners. Playful learning for all ages! Get your English learning games today.

intro.title: Fun and meaningful learning for all ages
intro.body: With our FURTHERMORE game series, take English wherever you go! Play with your family, your friends, or use it for a corporate game. We aim to bring English learning beyond the classroom through playful, engaging contexts.
intro.motto: The more you play, the more you learn.

features.familyBody: Enjoy English at home or on the go. Short activities, simple rules, and practical vocabulary.
features.corporateBody: Icebreakers, team-building, and English practice in real business situations.
features.outdoorBody: Take learning to parks, cafés, or events. Real-world English, made fun.

ctaBar.title: Want to play and learn?
ctaBar.subtitle: Write to us and we'll tell you how to bring FURTHERMORE to your home or company.

meta.title: TEFL by Further: Teach English Abroad in South America
meta.description: Live and work in the most beautiful city in South America. Our company provides teacher training so you can teach while living in Buenos Aires!

hero.title: TEFL:
hero.subtitle: Teaching English as a Foreign Language
hero.description: Ready to travel the world while teaching English? Further offers the complete TEFL Certification program you need. Live, work, and gain invaluable experience in Buenos Aires, consistently ranked among the most vibrant cities in South America.

items.title: Live and Work in Buenos Aires
items.body: Get the unique opportunity to live and work in the most beautiful city in South America.

items.title: Certified with Our TEFL Course
items.body: Learn how to teach English, mastering methodology, class best practices, and how to incorporate cutting-edge audiovisual material into your class.

items.title: Exclusive Job Consideration
items.body: After completing our course, you’ll immediately be considered to work for our company and start teaching English in Buenos Aires with TEFL by Further.

video.heading: Develop your teaching skills
video.lead: Start your global teaching journey today.
video.description: Our TEFL course gives you the tools to teach English effectively worldwide. Includes real teaching practice, communicative methodology, and job placement opportunities in Buenos Aires.

workAbroad.lead: A hands-on approach to planning, delivering, and evaluating impactful lessons.

cert.title: Certification and Methodology
cert.body1: Master approaches like Communicative Approach, TBL, PPP, and effective assessment techniques used in international classrooms.
cert.body2: Train to plan dynamic lessons, manage groups confidently, and measure progress through guided teaching practice.

items.title: Diagnosis and Goals
items.body: We assess your starting level and objectives to personalize your learning plan.

items.title: Training and Micro-Teaching
items.body: Participate in practical workshops with guided feedback and real classroom simulations.

items.title: Evaluation and Next Steps
items.body: Final portfolio and performance review with concrete results and certification.

items.a: No. We start from the methodological foundations, with guided practice and constant teacher support.
Yes. Our program follows CEFR standards and prepares you to teach English anywhere in the world.
Yes. Graduates are considered for job opportunities within Further Corporate and partner institutions.

cta.title: Ready to begin your TEFL journey?
cta.subtitle: Join our next certification and start your international teaching career.

meta.title: Further Media — English Podcasts, YouTube & TikTok Resources
meta.description: Learn English wherever you are! Access Further Records to explore English culture and vocabulary. Improve pronunciation and comprehension with our YouTube and TikTok resources.

records.title: Further Records: The Podcast for English Learners
records.intro: Our English podcast is part of the #FurtherExperience. Discover general culture topics and practice with exclusive worksheets designed by our academic team.
records.body: The English vocabulary review from each episode is available on our YouTube channel, and you can follow every transcript on our blog. Learn from our characters and boost your listening skills!

shorts.title: 📢 New! Further Shorts: Our Podcast for Beginner Levels
shorts.body: If you’re taking your first steps in English, our “Further Shorts” podcast is perfect for you. Designed for A1/A2 learners, it helps you develop listening skills and vocabulary through engaging cultural topics.
shorts.cta: Watch the Further Shorts playlist on YouTube

classes.title: Classes Beyond the Classroom
classes.body: At Further, we enhance the learning experience with original materials, AI-integrated resources for immersive practice, and complementary audio and video content. Each course includes access to tools that strengthen learning and ensure a transformative experience.

tiktok.title: Join our Community on TikTok
tiktok.feedLabel: Discover daily tips and short lessons

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions | Further Corporate
meta.description: Answers about our classes, services, certifications, payments, and more.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our programs
hero.body: Can’t find what you’re looking for? Contact us and we’ll be happy to help.

items.a: We are a language consultancy with over 25 years of experience in professional training, audiovisual content, and corporate communication skills development.
We offer onsite, online, and blended classes. Each program is tailored to goals and level, using original materials and CEFR-aligned modern methodologies.
We accept corporate billing, bank transfers, and custom payment plans depending on program duration.
Yes. All our programs include completion certificates and optional preparation for international exams such as Cambridge or TOEFL.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.body: Our team is here to help you find the right program for you or your organization.

meta.title: Further Corporate: Contact Us and Book Your Language Training
meta.description: Looking for in-company English training or customized language workshops? Get in touch and join the #FurtherExperience.

hero.title: Contact Us and Start Your Language Journey
hero.subtitle: Let’s talk and design your ideal training experience
hero.body: Tell us about your goals and we’ll create a customized language learning proposal for you. In-company classes, private lessons, or specialized workshops — start your #FurtherExperience today.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your objectives, team size, and expected timeframe...

errors.message: Please include a message so we can assist you.

sidebar.title: Contact Information
sidebar.body: If you prefer, you can also reach us directly via email or phone.

cta.body: Let’s set up a quick call to discuss your training needs and plan your program.

ctaFinal.title: We’re here to help
